name: War Never Changes
description:
This game was made for #1bitclickergamejam.

It's a very simple game about the stupidity of war.

What I wanted was to use the repetitive and mindless nature of clicker games and draw a parallel with war, as seen from someone high on the command chain.

In this game you control a High Ranked General, and you goal is to kill as many enemies as possible, and try no annihilate the enemy.

I didn't have a lot of time to work on it (about 10 hours), so I just put the very minimal mechanics and ideas I could to make it close to what I intended.
